skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of stealing 1 random buff from the target.

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Bamboozle
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Places a [Counterattack] buff on a target ally for 2 turns. Places a [Counterattack] buff for 3 turns instead if the ally is from the Shadowkin Faction. 

Then fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 15% and places a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on all allies for 2 turns. 

Also places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff for 2 turns on allies from the Shadowkin Faction.
skills.name: Thick as Thieves

skills.desc: Increases all heals and Turn Meter fill effects by 20% when used on allies from the Shadowkin Faction. If there are multiple Champions on the team with this skill, only one will activate.
skills.name: Brethren [P]
